Uses of Class
com.precog.client.rest.RequestBuilder

  • Packages that use RequestBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.precog.client.rest
    A simple REST client.

    • Uses of RequestBuilder in com.precog.client.rest

      Methods in com.precog.client.rest that return RequestBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.addAllParams(Map<String,String> params)
      Add many URL parameters to the request.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.addBasicAuth(String user, String password)
      Adds base authentication to a header map
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.addHeader(String key, String value)
      Add an HTTP header to the request.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.addParam(String key, String value)
      Add a URL parameter to the request.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setBody(byte[] bytes)
      Set the body of the request to bytes.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setBody(File file)
      Set the body of the request to use the contents of file.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setBody(InputStream body)
      Set the body of the request to use the contents of file.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setBody(String body)
      Set the body as the UTF-8 encoding of the string body.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setContentType(ContentType contentType)
      Set the content type of the request to contentType.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setHttpsRequired(boolean req)
      If set to true, then that means the request should not be executed unless the service is access via HTTPS (rather than HTTP).
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setMethod(Method method)
      Set the HTTP method to use for the request.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.setPath(Path path)
      Set the path to use.
